overview:
A Sausalito, CA-based writer/producer/director and social ecopreneur, Lou provides a unique visionary and triple net (people + planet + profit) value-added perspective to his work. He has more than 30 years experience from both the content creator and client consulting sides of entertainment media production, brand marketing, and sustainable non-profit funding development.

He is the founder and executive director of Virtual World Buildersâ„¢, a 3D Web interactive world software development firm specializing in content, non-profit and socially responsible corporate branding, digital media, and Web2.0 mixed reality event production services.

Lou and his team develop innovative approaches to producing avatars and 3D virtual worlds and original content and live events for social media networks and 3D virtual worlds, such as Second Life, and for wireless devices, such as the iPhone.

His current original content development efforts focus on integrated interactive short films, Internet TV, music, broadband/wireless and mobile content, and 3D Web animated virtual world venues.
